Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
Enemy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Sprite
public class Enemy extends Object implements Sprite
Contains methods for Enemy movement, behavior, and graphics.

      public Enemy(Color color, GameManager gameManager, int row, int column)
      Initializes Enemy fields
      Parameters:
      color - Color of the enemy in the GUI
      gameManager - Instance of game manager that the enemy is associated with
      row - Row that the enemy occupies in the formation
      column - Column that the enemy occupies in the formation

      Implements the move method from the interface.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      xIncrement - Double value representing the number of pixels that the enemy will move side to side

    • setSpawnPosition

      public void setSpawnPosition(double xPosition)
      Sets an enemy's spawn position when a new enemy enters from the top.
      Parameters:
      xPosition - Double value that represents the spawning enemy's horizontal position
